casebody.data:
HAWAII GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES ASSOCIATION, AFSCME LOCAL 152, AFL-CIO, Union-Appellant,
v.
State of Hawai'i, DEPARTMENTS OF HEALTH OR HUMAN SERVICES, as Agents of Governor David Y. Ige,1 Employer-Appellees NO. CAAP-14-0001078 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. February 28, 2019

--------

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Affirmed.

1 During the pendency of this appeal, Governor David I. Ige succeeded Governor Neil Abercrombie as Governor of the State of Hawai`i. Thus pursuant to Hawai`i Rule of Appellate Procedure Rule 43(c)(1), Governor Ige has been substituted automatically for former Governor Abercrombie in this case.
